creditline: The Blythe Brenden Endowment for Art Acquisition
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: wall hanging/relief; boat-shaped element at bottom with white on right side and red on left side and a cross inside a circle in black pigment at center; loop of thick wire at top with partial grid made of thinner wires; child-sized black three-dimensional hand hanging from loops of wire at top right; bulbous element in brown with encrustations at top attached on lower left with wire
inscription:

on back, in white: [RENE STOUT / \"CROSSROADS MARKER WITH LITTLE / HAND, REACHING / (2015)]

title: Crossroads Marker with Little Hand, Reaching
